Here's how @rachmartino creates her cuteFrench Fishtail pigtails:⠀Step 1 💚Use Garnier Fructis Sky-Hi Volume Mousse on damp hair to add some volume around the crown of the head.⠀Step 2 💚: Create a middle part and begin a French fishtail braid on one side of the head. This is similar to a traditional fishtail but each time you cross a strand of hair over the middle section of the braid, you will need to incorporate another free strand of hair from that side of your head into the cross-over.⠀Step 3 💚: Continue the French Fishtail braid until you've incorporated all hair on that side of the head. Then continue braiding as a traditional French braid; secure with an elastic. ⠀Step 4 💚: Repeat the process on the other side! #GarnierStyle

Here’s how to get this gorgeous braided crown from @simplysona! All you need is a curling wand, two hair elastics, a cute clip, #Fructis Style Sleek & Shine Anti-Humidity Smoothing Milk, and #SheerSet Hairspray!⠀1.  Apply #SleekandShine Anti-Humidity Smoothing Milk to prevent frizzy hair.2.  Curl hair with a curling wand to create loose curls.⠀3.  Grab a section of hair from the front left or right section of your head. You can leave out a few strands in front for a more romantic look!⠀4.  Separate three strands from the section and #braid hair. Secure with an elastic. ⠀5.  Repeat steps 3 and 4 on the opposite side of your head.⠀6.  Bring the two braids to the back of your head and secure, using bobby pins to form a triangle. ⠀7.  Remove the elastics from the end of each braid. ⠀8. Set the look with #SheerSet!

Easy like a #Sunday morning.  Here's how @thatsheart gets her simple #summer braid: 1. Start with second or third day hair for more texture2. Gather all your hair to one side of your head (whichever side you prefer 😁) and brush your hair to get rid of tangles3. Start fish tail braiding by splitting your hair into two large sections. Then take small pieces from the outside of those large sections and crossing it over the center. Repeat those steps till you get to the bottom4. Secure the braid with an elastic band5. Use Fructis Ultra Strong #SheerSet Hairspray to lock and hold6. And you're done WEEEEE!

Nothing completes your summer style like a cool #GarnierStyle braid. ☀️ To get this look: 1. Spray Beach Chic on damp hair to create loose waves2. Then spray De-Constructed Texture Tease, focusing on where you will braid to give the braids texture and volume3. Starting at the front of your hair by your temples, begin with a small regular french braid, continuing back to your ear then braid the rest of the way with a regular braid. Repeat on other side. Tip: Make sure when you are braiding, you keep the braids really tight.5. Take the braids and gently pull them apart to make them full and piece-y6. Take the two braids and cross them at the back of your hair to give you a halo effect, securing with bobby pins7. Finish with Garnier's Sheer Set Hairspray  #beauty_withme 📷 @marianna_hewitt

Still swooning over last night's hairstyles?? Try this twist on the classic French Twist 💚 1️⃣ Sweep one side of your hair towards the back of your head. Just before you reach the center, insert bobby pin vertically to hold hair down 2️⃣ Take other side of hair and roll towards the center bobby pin. 3️⃣ Hold hair in place as you insert bobby pins up length of the twist. Start from the bottom to secure those short pieces! 4️⃣ Keep adding Bobby pins and Sheer Set Hairspray until secure - there's never enough! 😜  #GarnierStyle

Here's how:1️⃣ Apply Root Amp Spray Mousse to the roots of damp hair & blow dry for volume 2️⃣ Once dry, spray Texture Tease all over to create wispiness & movement3️⃣ Create a deep side part & French braid along the hairline 4️⃣ Secure hair into a low pony at the nape of the neck 5️⃣ Finish with Anti-Humidity hairspray, add some gorgeous earrings and voila! Follow these steps to recreate celebrity stylist @jennifer_yepez clean, sleek bun:1⃣ Use Root Amp Thickening Spray to damp roots, and Sleek Primer all over. 2⃣ Blow dry small sections of hair flat to head, until completely smooth3⃣ Brush hair into low pony and tie with elastic4⃣ Smooth ends with Sleek & Shine Anti-frizz Serum and twist into bun, securing with bobby pins. 5⃣ Finish with Anti-Humidity Full Control hairspray. To get this effortless rocker #Garnierstyle follow these steps: 1⃣ Start with Full & Plush Thickening Lotion and blow dry with a paddle brush2⃣ Lightly spray with Anti-Humidity hairspray and curl 1" sections loosely all around head3⃣ Run fingers through curls and apply Texture Tease 4⃣ Finish with Anti-Humidity hairspray around the hairline to keep frizz away!

Gigi looks beyond amazing with her #Garnierstyle 💚💚 To get the look:1⃣ Apply Garnier Sky Hi Volume mousse and Voluptuous Blowout to wet hair from roots to ends. 2⃣ Blow dry hair with round brush starting from the nape and moving towards the front. 3⃣ Apply more mousse and Full & Plush Thickening Spray to front and tease up and back. 5⃣ Gently brush out teased section and finish off with Anti-Humidity hairsprayCheck out @maybelline for her red carpet makeup secrets!

Messy pony for @jasminevillegas final #Garnierstyle!  To recreate at home:1⃣ Prep wet hair with Sleek & Shine Primer2⃣Blow dry with round brush, creating volume 3⃣Spray Texture Tease at the root and tousle with fingers 4⃣ Tie hair into ponytail and finish with Anti-Humidity hairspray!

This is how @tommy_buckett created @jasminevillegas  amazing #Garnierstyle:1⃣ On wet hair, apply Brazilian Smooth Flatiron Express from mid shaft to tips, and Root Amp on roots2⃣ Rough dry hair with round brush 3⃣ Use flatiron to create textured "S wave"4⃣ Spray liberally with Texture Tease5⃣ Twist hair inward and pin into messy half bun, leaving the ends out 6⃣ Finish with Anti-Humidity Hairspray!
